atk-s0515a:418_3: Eko bhikkhu vattasampannasseva pesalassa bhikkhuno tattha āgamanaṃ na icchati,
atk-s0515a:418_6: Bhaṇḍanakārakādīnaṃ pana tattha vāsaṃ anicchato āvāsamacchariyaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0515a:419_1: Tattha aññassa upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchato kulamacchariyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a:419_2: Pāpapuggalassa pana upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchatopi macchariyaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0515a:419_4: Pasādaṃ rakkhituṃ samatthasseva pana bhikkhuno tattha upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchato macchariyaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a:420_1: Taṃ aññasmiṃ sīlavanteyeva labhante “mā labhatū”ti cintentassa lābhamacchariyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a:420_5: taṃ disvā “sace imaṃ esa na labheyya,
atk-s0515a:420_7: paribhogaṃ gaccheyyā”ti cintentassa macchariyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0515a:421_1: Tattha sarīravaṇṇe maccharī “paro pāsādiko rūpavā”ti vutte taṃ na kathetukāmo hoti.
atk-s0515a:421_2: Guṇavaṇṇamaccharī parassa sīlena dhutaṅgena paṭipadāya ācārena vaṇṇaṃ na kathetukāmo hoti.
atk-s0515a:422_2: attanā paṭividdhadhamme sadevakassa lokassa paṭivedhaṃ icchanti.
atk-s0515a:422_5: Tena samannāgato puggalo yaṃ guḷhaṃ ganthaṃ vā kathāmaggaṃ vā jānāti,
atk-s0515a:422_7: Yo pana puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena dhammaṃ vā upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena na deti,
atk-s0515a:422_13: Yo hi bhikkhu “ayaṃ puggalo paveṇiāgataṃ tantiṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ bhinditvā āluḷessatī”ti na deti,
atk-s0515a:422_14: ayaṃ puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena na deti nāma.
atk-s0515a:422_17: aññaṃ byākaritvā attānaṃ āvi katvā nassissatī”ti na deti,
atk-s0515a:422_18: ayaṃ dhammaṃ upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena na deti nāma.
atk-s0515a:422_20: amhākaṃ samayaṃ bhindituṃ samattho bhavissatī”ti na deti,
atk-s0515a:423_0: Imesu pañcasu macchariyesu āvāsamacchariyena tāva yakkho vā peto vā hutvā tasseva āvāsassa saṅkāraṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā vicarati.
atk-s0515a:423_1: Kulamacchariyena tasmiṃ kule aññesaṃ dānamānanādīni karonte disvā “bhinnaṃ vatidaṃ kulaṃ mamā”ti cintayato lohitampi mukhato uggacchati,
atk-s0515a:423_4: Lābhamacchariyena saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā santake lābhe maccharāyitvā puggalikaparibhogaṃ viya paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0515a:423_5: yakkho vā peto vā mahāajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0515a:423_6: Sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇamaccharena pana pariyattidhammamacchariyena ca attanova vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇeti,
atk-s0515a:423_7: paresaṃ vaṇṇe “kiṃ vaṇṇo eso”ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadanto pariyattidhammañca kassaci kiñci adento dubbaṇṇo ceva eḷamūgo ca hoti.
atk-s0515a:424_3: vaṇṇamacchariyena bhave bhave nibbattassa vaṇṇo nāma na hoti,
atk-s0515a:425_4: mā aññassā”ti sabbāpi attano sampattiyo byāpetuṃ na icchatīti viviccho,
atk-s0515a:425_10: Tena hi samannāgato puggalo parampi paresaṃ dadamānaṃ nivāreti.
atk-s0515a:428_0: Yācake disvā kaṭukabhāvena cittaṃ añcati saṅkocetīti kaṭukañcuko,
atk-s0515a:428_4: Samatittikapuṇṇāya hi ukkhaliyā bhattaṃ gaṇhanto sabbatobhāgena saṅkuṭitena aggakaṭacchunā gaṇhāti pūretvā gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0515a:428_6: tasmiṃ saṅkucite kāyopi tatheva saṅkucati paṭikuṭati paṭinivaṭṭati na sampasārīyatīti maccheraṃ “kaṭukañcukatā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:429_0: Aggahitattaṃ cittassāti paresaṃ upakārakaraṇe dānādinā ākārena yathā na sampasārīyati,
atk-s0515a:429_2: Yasmā pana maccharipuggalo attano santakaṃ paresaṃ adātukāmo hoti,
atk-s0515a:429_5: mā aññassā”ti pavattivasenassa attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇatā parasampattiggahaṇalakkhaṇatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:430_0: Khandhamacchariyampi macchariyanti attano pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ upapattibhavaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ “acchariyaṃ mayhameva hotu,
atk-s0515a:430_1: mā aññassā”ti pavattaṃ macchariyaṃ khandhamacchariyaṃ nāma.
atk-s0515a:430_5: Yācakānaṃ adadamāno hi tehi kathitaṃ na jānāti nāma.
atk-s0515a:430_11: Atha vā dassetvā kathanaṃ vacanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0515a:430_15: Atha vā paritāpadukkhaṃ nāsetvā kathanaṃ vacanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0515a:430_22: Maggasaccabhāvanāpaṭivedhayuttaṃ anusiṭṭhīti evamādinā nayena eke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a:431_1: Na sotaṃ odahantīti savanatthaṃ kaṇṇasotaṃ na ṭhapenti.
atk-s0515a:431_2: Na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapentīti jānanatthaṃ cittaṃ na patiṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0515a:431_4: Avacanakarāti suṇamānāpi vacanaṃ na karontīti avacanakarā.
atk-s0515a:431_6: Aññeneva mukhaṃ karontīti karontāpi mukhaṃ na dentīti attho.
atk-s0515a:433_7: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpitā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārapavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0515a:433_8: So guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
atk-s0515a:433_14: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
atk-s0515a:434_1: pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacittaṃ upakkamo tena maraṇanti.
atk-s0515a:434_3: sāhatthiko āṇattiko nissaggiyo thāvaro vijjāmayo iddhimayoti.
atk-s0515a:434_7: atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:435_1: parassa haraṇaṃ theyyaṃ corikāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a:435_3: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti,
atk-s0515a:435_4: tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ.
atk-s0515a:435_8: vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0515a:435_9: Taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0515a:436_1: parapariggahitaṃ parapariggahitasaññitā theyyacittaṃ upakkamo tena haraṇanti.
atk-s0515a:436_3: Te ca kho yathānurūpaṃ theyyāvahāro pasayhāvahāro paṭicchannāvahāro parikappāvahāro kusāvahāroti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ avahārānaṃ vasena pavattanti.
atk-s0515a:437_2: Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammasevanādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-s0515a:438_0: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā
atk-s0515a:438_1: bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sārakkhā saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa,
atk-s0515a:438_2: dhanakkītā chandavāsinī bhogavāsinī paṭavāsinī odapattakinī obhatacumbaṭakā dāsī ca bhariyā kammakārī
atk-s0515a:438_3: ca bhariyā dhajāhaṭā muhuttikāti etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo.
atk-s0515a:438_4: Itthīsu pana dvīnnaṃ sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā,
atk-s0515a:439_0: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo,
atk-s0515a:439_3: agamanīyavatthu tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ sevanapayogo maggena maggapaṭipattiadhivāsananti.
atk-s0515a:440_0: Musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyapayogo vā.
atk-s0515a:440_5: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0515a:440_9: Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya “natthī”tiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0515a:440_11: Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0515a:440_12: adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0515a:441_1: atathaṃ vatthu visaṃvādanacittaṃ tajjo vāyāmo parassa tadatthavijānananti.
atk-s0515a:441_3: So ca kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a:441_4: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0515a:442_0: Pisuṇavācātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0515a:442_1: tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti,
atk-s0515a:442_3: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ karoti,
atk-s0515a:442_4: yā vācā sayampi pharusā neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayaṅgamā,
atk-s0515a:443_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā.
atk-s0515a:444_1: bhinditabbo paro “iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissantī”ti bhedapurekkhāratā vā,
atk-s0515a:444_2: “iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko”ti viyakamyatā vā,
atk-s0515a:445_1: Mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti.
atk-s0515a:445_2: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti “corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū”ti,
atk-s0515a:445_3: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0515a:445_4: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti “kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti,
atk-s0515a:445_7: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti,
atk-s0515a:445_9: Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti,
atk-s0515a:447_2: Sā “aho vata idaṃ mamāssā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā.
atk-s0515a:447_6: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0515a:447_7: yāva “aho vatidaṃ mamāssā”ti attano na pariṇāmeti.
atk-s0515a:448_5: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0515a:448_6: yāva “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsaṃ na cintesi.
atk-s0515a:450_2: Bhavissāma nu kho mayantiādinā attānaṃ kaṅkhanti.
atk-s0515a:450_4: Na nu kho bhavissāmāti tassa sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attānaṃ vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhanti.
atk-s0515a:450_5: Kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmāti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyā nu kho bhavissāma,
atk-s0515a:450_7: Kathaṃ nu kho bhavissāmāti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīghā nu kho bhavissāma,
atk-s0515a:450_9: Keci pana “issaranimmānādīni nissāya ‘kena nu kho kāraṇena bhavissāmā’ti hetuto kaṅkhantī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0515a:450_10: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāma nu kho mayanti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyā hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇā bhavissāma…pe…
atk-s0515a:450_11: devā hutvā manussā”ti attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhanti.
atk-s0515a:451_8: adhisīlañca taṃ sikkhitabbaṭṭhena sikkhā cāti adhisīlasikkhā.
atk-s0515a:452_7: Tañhi buddhe uppannepi anuppannepi loke pavattati.
atk-s0515a:452_8: Uppanne buddhe tasmiṃ sīle buddhāpi sāvakāpi mahājanaṃ samādapenti,
atk-s0515a:452_9: anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhā ca kammavādino ca dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca cakkavattī ca mahārājāno mahābodhisattā ca samādapenti,
atk-s0515a:452_11: Te taṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paripūretvā devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhonti.
atk-s0515a:453_1: Tañhi sūriyo viya pajjotānaṃ sineru viya pabbatānaṃ sabbalokiyasīlānaṃ adhikañceva uttamañca,
atk-s0515a:453_4: Na hi taṃ paññattiṃ uddharitvā añño satto ṭhapetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0515a:453_5: Buddhāyeva pana sabbaso kāyavacīdvāraajjhācārasotaṃ chinditvā tassa tassa vītikkamassa anucchavikaṃ taṃ sīlasaṃvaraṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0515a:454_0: Kāmāvacarāni pana aṭṭha kusalacittāni lokiyaaṭṭhasamāpatticittāni ca ekajjhaṃ katvā cittamevāti veditabbāni.
atk-s0515a:456_0: “Atthi dinnaṃ atthi yiṭṭha”ntiādinayappavattaṃ pana kammassakatāñāṇaṃ paññā.
atk-s0515a:456_1: Sā hi buddhe uppannepi anuppannepi loke pavattati.
atk-s0515a:456_2: Uppanne buddhe tassā paññāya buddhāpi sāvakāpi mahājanaṃ samādapenti,
atk-s0515a:456_3: anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhā ca kammavādino ca dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca cakkavattī ca mahārājāno mahābodhisattā ca samādapenti,
atk-s0515a:456_5: Tathā hi aṅkuro dasavassasahassāni mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0515a:456_6: Velāmo vessantaro aññe ca bahū paṇḍitamanussā mahādānāni adaṃsu.
atk-s0515a:456_7: Te taṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paripūretvā devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0515a:457_3: na ca vinā buddhuppādā loke pavattati.
atk-s0515a:458_3: Idhāti vacanaṃ pubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadāya sampannassa sabbapakārasīlaparipūrakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpanaṃ,
atk-s0515a:458_9: Bhikkhūti tassa sīlassa paripūrakassa puggalassa paridīpanaṃ.
atk-s0515a:458_13: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idamassa pātimokkhato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0515a:459_0: Tattha bhikkhūti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhu.
atk-s0515a:459_1: Sīlamassa atthīti sīlavāti ettha sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ.
atk-s0515a:459_7: Etadeva hi ettha atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇavidū anujānanti.
atk-s0515a:459_8: Aññe pana “adhisevanaṭṭhena ācāraṭṭhena sīlanaṭṭhena siraṭṭhena sītalaṭṭhena sivaṭṭhena sīla”nti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a:462_0: Yathā hi nīlapītādibhedenanekadhā bhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nīlādibhedena bhinnassāpi sanidassanabhāvānatikkamanato.
atk-s0515a:462_1: Tathā sīlassa cetanādibhedena anekadhā bhinnassāpi yadetaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ samādhānavasena,
atk-s0515a:465_0: Tasmā idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma kiccaṭṭhena rasena dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ,
atk-s0515a:468_0: Tañhidaṃ sīlaṃ “kāyasoceyyaṃ vacīsoceyyaṃ manosoceyya”nti evaṃ vuttasoceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0515a:468_2: Hirottappañca pana tassa viññūhi padaṭṭhānanti vaṇṇitaṃ,
atk-s0515a:468_4: Hirottappe hi sati sīlaṃ uppajjati ceva tiṭṭhati ca,
atk-s0515a:468_5: asati neva uppajjati ceva na tiṭṭhati cāti evaṃvidhena sīlena sīlavā hoti.
atk-s0515a:468_6: Etaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa,
atk-s0515a:468_7: vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:469_0: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanā.
atk-s0515a:469_1: Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati.
atk-s0515a:469_2: Api ca cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa sattakammapathacetanā.
atk-s0515a:469_3: Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma “abhijjhaṃ pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharatī”tiādinā nayena saṃyuttamahāvagge vuttā anabhijjhābyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā.
atk-s0515a:469_4: Saṃvaro sīlanti ettha pañcavidhena saṃvaro veditabbo –
atk-s0515a:470_5: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ceva gocarena ca sampanno.
atk-s0515a:470_10: Sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati.
atk-s0515a:470_11: Api ca samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā,
atk-s0515a:471_2: Yasmā pana pātimokkhasīlena bhikkhu sāsane patiṭṭhāti nāma,
atk-s0515a:471_5: kusalā dhammā eva vā ettha patiṭṭhahantīti patiṭṭhā.
atk-s0515a:471_11: sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti ca ādisuttavasena veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:472_1: Vuttampi cetaṃ “tasmātiha tvaṃ uttiya ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
atk-s0515a:472_4: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṃ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ nagaraṭṭhānaṃ sodheti,
atk-s0515a:472_5: tato aparabhāge vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvāva nagaraṃ māpeti.
atk-s0515a:472_8: Yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṃ tīhi khārehi vatthaṃ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṃ raṅgajātaṃ upaneti,
atk-s0515a:472_9: yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṃ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0515a:472_11: Evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṃ visodhetvā aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti.
atk-s0515a:473_2: Yathā hi chinnacaraṇassa purisassa disaṃ gamanābhisaṅkhāro na jāyati,
atk-s0515a:473_4: evameva yassa sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti khaṇḍaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a:473_6: Yassa pana taṃ abhinnaṃ hoti akhaṇḍaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a:474_1: Saṃvaraṇavasena saṃvaroti ubhayenāpi sīlasaṃyamo ceva sīlasaṃvaro ca kathito.
atk-s0515a:474_3: puggalaṃ vā saṃyameti vītikkamavasena tassa vipphandituṃ na detīti saṃyamo.
atk-s0515a:475_1: Yathā hi sattānaṃ catubbidho āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati,
atk-s0515a:475_2: evaṃ yoginopi catubhūmakakusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti.
atk-s0515a:475_6: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyāti catubhūmakakusalānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pāmokkhaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ padhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:476_0: Vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi vivicca vinā hutvā apakkamitvā.
atk-s0515a:476_4: tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa
atk-s0515a:476_5: paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ kāmapariccāgeneva cassa adhigamaṃ dīpeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0515a:476_6: “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0515a:476_8: yesu sati idaṃ na pavattati andhakāre sati padīpobhāso viya,
atk-s0515a:476_9: tesaṃ pariccāgeneva cassa adhigamo hoti orimatīrapariccāgena pārimatīrasseva.
atk-s0515a:477_0: Tattha siyā “kasmā panesa pubbapadeyeva vutto na uttarapade,
atk-s0515a:477_1: kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti?
atk-s0515a:477_3: Taṃnissaraṇato hi pubbapade eva esa vutto.
atk-s0515a:477_4: Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a:477_8: idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro ānetvā vuccati,
atk-s0515a:477_10: Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusalehi dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
atk-s0515a:477_11: Tasmā vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi dhammehīti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a:477_12: Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi viviccāti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0515a:478_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca idha “katame vatthukāmā manāpikā rūpā”tiādinā nayena vatthukāmā vuttā,
atk-s0515a:478_1: ye ca idheva vibhaṅge “chando kāmo rāgo kāmo chandarāgo kāmo saṅkappo kāmo rāgo kāmo saṅkapparāgo kāmo”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā vuttā,
atk-s0515a:478_3: Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati.
atk-s0515a:479_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati.
atk-s0515a:479_2: Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo,
atk-s0515a:479_3: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti.
atk-s0515a:479_4: Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
atk-s0515a:479_10: Esa tāva nayo “kāmehī”ti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
atk-s0515a:480_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandova “kāmo”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0515a:480_1: So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmacchando,
atk-s0515a:480_2: kāmo”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto.
atk-s0515a:480_5: Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:480_6: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā,
atk-s0515a:480_7: kāmacchando”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge uparijhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato nīvaraṇāneva vuttāni.
atk-s0515a:480_8: Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni tesaṃ jhānaṅgāneva paṭipakkhāni,
atk-s0515a:481_0: Evamettha vivicceva kāmehīti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti,
atk-s0515a:481_1: vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti iminā pañcannampi nīvaraṇānaṃ.
atk-s0515a:481_4: Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassa lobhassa,
atk-s0515a:481_11: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:482_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:482_3: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci aviyoge oḷārikaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇḍābhighāto viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko,
atk-s0515a:482_4: sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvena ca ghaṇḍānuravo viya anupabandho vicāro.
atk-s0515a:482_5: Vipphāravā cettha vitakko paṭhamuppattikāle paripphandanabhūto cittassa,
atk-s0515a:482_10: paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
atk-s0515a:483_0: Dukanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā
atk-s0515a:483_1: gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko,
atk-s0515a:483_2: vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:483_4: So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0515a:483_5: Api ca malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena
atk-s0515a:483_8: Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko.
atk-s0515a:483_9: Ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro.
atk-s0515a:483_10: Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko.
atk-s0515a:483_12: Iti iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho viya pupphena ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti vuccati.
atk-s0515a:485_0: Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0515a:486_1: Tāya hi uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a:486_2: Sā panesā pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ paripūreti kāyapassaddhiñca cittapassaddhiñca,
atk-s0515a:486_3: passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhampi sukhaṃ paripūreti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca,
atk-s0515a:486_4: sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti khaṇikasamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiñcāti.
atk-s0515a:486_5: Tāsu yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṅgatā pharaṇāpīti,
atk-s0515a:487_4: suṭṭhu vā khādati khaṇati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ,
atk-s0515a:487_7: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti,
atk-s0515a:487_17: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:487_18: Iti ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa,
atk-s0515a:487_19: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ “pītisukha”nti vuccati.
atk-s0515a:488_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ dhammavinayādayo viya.
atk-s0515a:488_2: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ.
atk-s0515a:488_6: tasmā alopasamāsaṃ katvā ekapadeneva “vivekajaṃpītisukha”ntipi vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-s0515a:489_3: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyantīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti saṅkhyaṃ gatā.
atk-s0515a:489_6: Vipassanāya katakiccassa maggena ijjhanato maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ,
atk-s0515a:489_7: phalaṃ pana nirodhasaccaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ.
atk-s0515a:489_10: Tasmā ārammaṇūpanijjhānato ca lakkhaṇūpanijjhānato ca paccanīkajhāpanato ca jhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:490_5: vuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa iriyanaṃ vuttiṃ abhinipphādeti.
atk-s0515a:491_0: Taṃ panetaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a:491_2: Tattha kāmacchando byāpādo thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānavasena pañcaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:491_3: Na hi etesu appahīnesu jhānaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0515a:491_5: Kiñcāpi hi jhānakkhaṇe aññepi akusalā dhammā pahīyanti,
atk-s0515a:491_7: Kāmacchandena hi nānāvisayappalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati,
atk-s0515a:491_10: Byāpādena vā ārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ na nirantaraṃ pavattati.
atk-s0515a:491_14: Iti visesena jhānantarāyakarattā etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttāni.
atk-s0515a:492_0: Yasmā pana vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti,
atk-s0515a:492_2: tehi avikkhepāya sampāditapayogassa cetaso payogasampattisambhavā pīti pīṇanaṃ sukhañca upabrūhanaṃ karoti.
atk-s0515a:492_3: Athassa sesasampayuttadhammā etehi abhiniropanānubandhanapīṇanupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā ekattārammaṇe samaṃ sammā ca ādhiyati.
atk-s0515a:492_4: Tasmā vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ uppattivasena pañcaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:492_5: Uppannesu hi etesu pañcasu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a:492_7: Tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:492_11: evamidampi aṅgamattavaseneva pañcaṅgikanti vā pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti vā vuccatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:493_0: Etāni ca pañcaṅgāni kiñcāpi upacārakkhaṇepi atthi,
atk-s0515a:493_2: Idha pana upacāratopi balavatarāni rūpāvacaralakkhaṇappattāni nipphannāni.
atk-s0515a:493_3: Ettha hi vitakko suvisadena ākārena ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayamāno uppajjati.
atk-s0515a:493_7: “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0515a:493_8: Cittekaggatāpi heṭṭhimamhi samuggapaṭale uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ viya ārammaṇesu phusitā hutvā uppajjati,
atk-s0515a:493_10: Tattha cittekaggatā kiñcāpi “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti imasmiṃ pāṭhe na niddiṭṭhā,
atk-s0515a:493_11: tathāpi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatā”ti evaṃ vuttattā aṅgameva.
atk-s0515a:493_12: Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā uddeso kato,
atk-s0515a:495_1: Tesaṃyeva ca ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:496_11: yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0515a:498_9: Tena vuccati ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti catulakkhaṇasampannañcā”’ti.
atk-s0515a:499_3: Yasmā pana “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0515a:499_6: dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:500_2: tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo tassa jhānassa paripantho,
atk-s0515a:500_4: Visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0515a:500_6: Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittaṃ ekasantatipariṇāmanayena tathattaṃ upagacchamānaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati nāma,
atk-s0515a:500_7: evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma.
atk-s0515a:500_8: Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākāranipphādikā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:501_0: Evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
atk-s0515a:501_1: Samathabhāvūpagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
atk-s0515a:501_2: Samathapaṭipannabhāvato eva cassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
atk-s0515a:502_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tattha jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā,
atk-s0515a:502_1: yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni,
atk-s0515a:502_2: yañcesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati,
atk-s0515a:502_3: yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā,
atk-s0515a:502_4: sabbepi te ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā sampahaṃsitattā
atk-s0515a:502_6: tasmā “dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:503_0: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā samatikkamā,
atk-s0515a:503_2: Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi,
atk-s0515a:503_5: Oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
atk-s0515a:504_3: Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ca ceto sampasādayati,
atk-s0515a:504_5: Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:504_6: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:505_2: vitakkavicārehi anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho.
atk-s0515a:505_4: Vitakkavicāravirahito vā eko asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0515a:505_7: Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi,
atk-s0515a:505_9: Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
atk-s0515a:506_2: atha kasmā idameva “sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāva”nti vuttanti? Vuccate –
atk-s0515a:506_3: aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
atk-s0515a:506_4: tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya sampasādananti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:506_5: Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo,
atk-s0515a:506_7: Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
atk-s0515a:507_3: Etthāha “nanu ca ‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’ti imināpi ayamattho siddho.
atk-s0515a:507_4: Atha kasmā puna vuttaṃ ‘avitakkaṃ avicāra”’nti? Vuccate – evametaṃ,
atk-s0515a:507_7: nanu avocumha “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a:507_8: samadhigamo hotīti dassanatthaṃ ‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’ti evaṃ vutta”nti.
atk-s0515a:508_0: Api ca vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ sampasādanaṃ,
atk-s0515a:508_4: na paṭhamajjhānamiva ca aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0515a:508_5: Tathā vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ,
atk-s0515a:508_6: na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca abhāvāti,
atk-s0515a:509_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho.
atk-s0515a:509_2: atha kho ayameva samādhi “samādhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0515a:510_0: Dutiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā dutiyaṃ. Idaṃ dutiyaṃ uppannantipi dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0515a:511_0: Pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
atk-s0515a:511_3: so vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ vā.
atk-s0515a:511_6: kiñca bhiyyo vūpasamā cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:511_7: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo jigucchanattho hoti,
atk-s0515a:511_8: tasmā pītiyā jigucchanā ca samatikkamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a:511_11: kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:511_12: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti,
atk-s0515a:511_13: tasmā pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a:512_1: imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:512_2: “Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati “nūna vitakkavicāravūpasamo maggo imassa jhānassā”ti.
atk-s0515a:512_3: Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti
atk-s0515a:512_6: evameva idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0515a:512_7: tenāyamattho vutto “pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti.
atk-s0515a:513_0: Upekkhako ca viharatīti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:513_3: Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī “upekkhako”ti vuccati.
atk-s0515a:514_1: chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārupekkhā bojjhaṅgupekkhā vīriyupekkhā saṅkhārupekkhā vedanupekkhā vipassanupekkhā
atk-s0515a:515_2: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
atk-s0515a:515_3: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
atk-s0515a:516_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:517_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:518_0: Yā pana “kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:519_3: dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanāgahaṇe majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:520_0: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaṅkhātā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:521_2: upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:522_0: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:523_0: Yā pana “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:524_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā,
atk-s0515a:525_0: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā,
atk-s0515a:525_2: Tena tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo.
atk-s0515a:525_3: Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena bhedo viya,
atk-s0515a:526_4: yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake
atk-s0515a:526_5: nipannaṃ disvā “sappo nu kho no”ti avalokentassa sovatthikattayaṃ disvā nibbematikassa “sappo na sappo”ti
atk-s0515a:526_7: evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati,
atk-s0515a:526_9: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍakena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā “kintāhaṃ imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca
atk-s0515a:526_10: iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti,
atk-s0515a:526_11: evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā āditte viya tayo bhave passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā,
atk-s0515a:526_13: Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti.
atk-s0515a:526_14: Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu majjhattatāsaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti.
atk-s0515a:526_15: Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi ca atthato bhinnāyevāti.
atk-s0515a:530_0: Duve paññā tato dvīhi, catassova bhavantimā”ti.
atk-s0515a:531_0: Iti imāsu upekkhāsu jhānupekkhā idha adhippetā.
atk-s0515a:531_7: Tasmā tatrāpi ‘upekkhako ca viharatī’ti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā,
atk-s0515a:531_12: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā,
atk-s0515a:532_0: Sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato.
atk-s0515a:532_2: Iti puggalena sati ca sampajaññañca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:533_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi,
atk-s0515a:533_1: muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa upacāramattampi na sampajjati,
atk-s0515a:533_3: Oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti,
atk-s0515a:533_5: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā
atk-s0515a:533_6: eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:533_8: yathā dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati,
atk-s0515a:533_9: evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
atk-s0515a:533_15: no aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:534_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo natthi,
atk-s0515a:534_1: evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0515a:534_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo,
atk-s0515a:534_4: yassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya,
atk-s0515a:534_5: tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”ti āha.
atk-s0515a:535_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
atk-s0515a:535_1: buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti,
atk-s0515a:535_4: Taṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:536_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti?
atk-s0515a:536_2: Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako,
atk-s0515a:536_6: Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-s0515a:536_8: Iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsento “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:537_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
atk-s0515a:537_3: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā,
atk-s0515a:538_5: indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassānaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:539_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti,
atk-s0515a:539_1: atha kasmā “kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha,
atk-s0515a:539_12: Ettha cuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti.
atk-s0515a:540_0: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānūpacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti,
atk-s0515a:540_2: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0515a:540_4: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti,
atk-s0515a:540_5: sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0515a:540_7: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati,
atk-s0515a:540_11: Appahīnāyeva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti,
atk-s0515a:540_14: Tathā tatiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa siyā uppatti,
atk-s0515a:540_16: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhāti.
atk-s0515a:540_18: appanāpattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti,
atk-s0515a:540_20: Tasmā eva ca “etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
atk-s0515a:541_1: “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā”ti?
atk-s0515a:541_3: Yā hi ayaṃ adukkhamasukhanti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-s0515a:541_6: tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa sukhagahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati,
atk-s0515a:541_7: athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ “ayaṃ so gaṇhatha na”nti tampi gāhāpeti,
atk-s0515a:541_8: evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāharīti.
atk-s0515a:541_9: Evañhi samāhaṭā etā dassetvā “yaṃ neva sukhaṃ,
atk-s0515a:541_13: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
atk-s0515a:542_0: Api ca adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:542_5: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ime kho, āvuso,
atk-s0515a:542_7: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ “tattha pahīnā”ti vuttā,
atk-s0515a:542_8: evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:542_9: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:542_14: Sukhādighātena ca te sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-s0515a:544_6: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha sati pārisuddhi hoti,
atk-s0515a:545_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati,
atk-s0515a:545_1: yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā
atk-s0515a:545_2: divā vijjamānāpi candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā,
atk-s0515a:545_3: evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā
atk-s0515a:545_5: Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti.
atk-s0515a:545_7: Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ
atk-s0515a:545_9: tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā.
atk-s0515a:546_0: Paññavā hotīti paññā assa atthīti paññavā.
atk-s0515a:546_6: So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu “ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti paṭivijjhati.
atk-s0515a:546_7: Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti.
atk-s0515a:546_10: Tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0515a:547_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento “ime āsavā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a:547_2: Evaṃ tisso sikkhāyo dassetvā idāni tāsaṃ pāripūrikkamaṃ dassetuṃ “imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjanto sikkheyyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a:547_8: paccavekkhitvā tattheva cittaṃ acalaṃ katvā patiṭṭhapentopi sikkheyya,
atk-s0515a:547_10: abhiññeyyābhijānanakālepi taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ karontopi tisso sikkhāyo sikkheyya,
atk-s0515a:548_1: Imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0515a:548_2: Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati.
atk-s0515a:548_12: Tasmā “imissā diṭṭhiyā”tiādīsu imissā buddhadiṭṭhiyā imissā buddhakhantiyā imissā buddharuciyā imasmiṃ
atk-s0515a:551_0: Evaṃ vutte imasmiṃ buddhadhammavinaye imasmiṃ buddhapāvacane imasmiṃ buddhabrahmacariye imasmiṃ buddhasāsaneti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:552_0: Api cetaṃ sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi.
atk-s0515a:552_4: Attano kārakaṃ apāyesu apatamānaṃ katvā dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-s0515a:552_6: Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo.
atk-s0515a:552_7: Kusaladhammehi vā akusaladhammānaṃ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo.
atk-s0515a:554_0: Dhammena vā vinayo, na daṇḍādīhīti dhammavinayo. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0515a:559_10: Saṃsāradhammato hi sokādidhammato vā esa visiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ nayati.
atk-s0515a:560_0: Yasmā vā dhammā eva abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca,
atk-s0515a:560_2: na sattesu na jīvesu cāti dhammavinayo.
atk-s0515a:560_3: Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi aññesaṃ vacanato padhānaṃ vacananti pavacanaṃ,
atk-s0515a:560_8: “So vo mamaccayena satthāti hi dhammavinayova satthā”ti vuttoti evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:561_0: Yasmā pana imasmiṃyeva sāsane sabbappakārajjhānanibbattako bhikkhu dissati,
atk-s0515a:561_2: tasmā tattha tattha “imissā”ti ca “imasmi”nti ca ayaṃ niyamo katoti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:562_4: Lakkhaṇādīhi pana attanā avinibhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ,
atk-s0515a:562_8: Santepi ca anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti,
atk-s0515a:562_10: Yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppannepi ca dhamme pāleti,
atk-s0515a:562_23: Sarasaparittatāya vāti attano paccayabhūtānaṃ kiccānaṃ sampattīnaṃ vā appatāya dubbalatāya.
atk-s0515a:563_0: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “kathaṃ ṭhitiparittatāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a:563_1: Tattha “atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvitthāti evamādi pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃ cittassa nirujjhanakāle sabbasmiṃ
atk-s0515a:563_2: rūpārūpadhamme anirujjhantepi rūpato arūpassa paṭṭhānabhāvena arūpajīvitaṃ sandhāya,
atk-s0515a:563_3: cuticittena vā saddhiṃ sabbesaṃ rūpārūpānaṃ nirujjhanabhāvena pañcavokārabhave cuticittaṃ sandhāya,
atk-s0515a:563_4: catuvokārabhave rūpassa abhāvena catuvokārabhavaṃ sandhāya kathita”nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:563_5: Atīte cittakkhaṇeti atītacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīkāle taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo “jīvittha” iti vattuṃ labbhati.
atk-s0515a:563_8: Anāgate cittakkhaṇe jīvissatīti anāgatacittassa anuppajjanakkhaṇasamaṅgīkāle “jīvissatī”ti vattuṃ labbhati.
atk-s0515a:564_0: Jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca sukhadukkhā cāti ayaṃ gāthā pañcavokārabhavaṃ amuñcitvā labbhamānāya dukkhāya vedanāya
atk-s0515a:564_1: gahitattā pañcavokārabhavameva sandhāya vuttāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0515a:564_5: sukhamicceva bhāsitā”ti vuttattā upekkhāvedanā antokaritvā sukhadukkhā cāti vedanākkhandho,
atk-s0515a:564_7: Imesaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ kathitattāyeva khandhalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇabhāvena lakkhaṇākāravasena saññākkhandhopi kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:564_8: Evaṃ vuttesu pañcasu khandhesu arūpadhammaṃ muñcitvā kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpassa appavattanabhāvena ekacittasamāyuttāti arūpapadhānabhāvo kathito hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0515a:564_11: Evaṃ attano appavattiṭṭhānepi rūpapavattiṃ attano santakameva katvā pavattanasabhāvassa arūpadhammassa
atk-s0515a:564_12: attano pavattiṭṭhāne rūpapavattiyā padhānakāraṇabhāvena ekacittasamāyuttāti cittapadhānabhāvo kathitoti
atk-s0515a:565_0: Evaṃ pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃ rūpapavattiyā padhānabhūtacittanirodhena rūpe dharamāneyeva pavattānaṃ
atk-s0515a:565_1: nirodho nāma hotīti arūpadhammavasena eva “lahuso vattate khaṇo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a:565_2: Atha vā pañcavokārabhave cuticittaṃ sandhāya kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a:565_3: Evaṃ kathiyamāne sukhadukkhā cāti kāyikacetasikasukhavedanā ca kāyikacetasikadukkhavedanā ca cuticittakkhaṇe
atk-s0515a:565_4: ahontīpi ekasantativasena cuticittena saddhiṃ nirujjhatīti kathitā.
atk-s0515a:565_5: Catuvokārabhavaṃ vā sandhāya kathitātipi veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0515a:565_6: Aññasmiṃ ṭhāne attabhāvoti saññākkhandhassa vuttabhāvena attabhāvoti saññākkhandhova gahito.
atk-s0515a:565_7: Brahmaloke kāyikasukhadukkhadomanassaṃ ahontampi sukhadukkhā cāti vedanāsāmaññato labbhamāno vedanākkhandho gahitoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a:565_9: Imesu ca tīsu vikappesu kevalāti dhuvasukhasubhaattā natthi,
atk-s0515a:565_11: Lahuso vattati khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiparitto jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.
atk-s0515a:566_0: Ekato dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ appavattiṃ dassento “cullāsītisahassānī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0515a:566_2: kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marūti ye devagaṇā caturāsīti kappasahassāni āyuṃ gahetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatane tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0515a:566_5: dvīhi cittasamohitāti tepi devā dvīhi cittehi samohitā ekato hutvā yuganaddhena cittena na tu eva jīvanti,

atk-s0515a:602_0: Yathā vā “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīni cakkhuādināmena vuttāni,
atk-s0515a:602_2: Tasmā “evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabba”ntiādīsu evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:602_3: Evaṃ sante cittārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato imasmimpi sutte kiccaṭṭheneva rasena “saṅghaṭṭanaraso”ti siddho hoti.
atk-s0515a:602_4: Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātassa pana attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0515a:602_5: Ayañhi tattha tattha “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti evaṃ kāraṇasseva vasena paveditoti.
atk-s0515a:602_6: Imassa ca suttapadassa tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phassoti ayamattho,
atk-s0515a:603_0: Evaṃ paveditattā pana tenevākārena paccupaṭṭhātīti “sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti vutto.
atk-s0515a:603_1: Phalaṭṭhena pana paccupaṭṭhānenesa vedanāpaccupaṭṭhāno nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a:603_4: Uppādayamāno ca yathā bahiddhā uṇhapaccayāpi samānā lākhāsaṅkhātadhātunissitā usmā attano nissaye mudubhāvakārī hoti,
atk-s0515a:603_5: na attano paccayabhūtepi bahiddhā vītaccitaṅgārasaṅkhāte uṇhabhāve.
atk-s0515a:603_6: Evaṃ vatthārammaṇasaṅkhātaaññapaccayopi samāno cittanissitattā attano nissayabhūte citte eva esa vedanuppādako hoti,
atk-s0515a:603_7: na attano paccayabhūtepi vatthumhi ārammaṇevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a:603_8: Tajjena samannāhārena pana indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyena uppajjanato esa “āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno”ti vuccati.
